txt.en: Approach the scout to return to camp
Approach the scout to return to camp.
Explore further along the Greyflood and find the source of the apparitions that haunt it.

'During your battle, I spied an ominous green flame guttering in the ruins along the river's edge - perhaps it has something to do with these spirits? Let us return to Hithriel and prepare for our next step.'
Discover the source of the Greyflood apparitions
Explore further along the Greyflood and find the source of the apparitions that haunt it.
As the Vengeful Darkwater fades, a scout approaches.
